mg6xP24e6n86prVtf.name: Sympathy
mg6xP24e6n86prVtf.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP

mujrOOs5utWdRVZpN.name: Sympathy
mujrOOs5utWdRVZpN.notes: Death of one party reduces the other to 0 HP and wounds affect ally but not you

mKUMTr3tgkdHV2y4b.name: Sympathy
mKUMTr3tgkdHV2y4b.notes: Death of one party kills the other

mb9gEAkIZ0mVDLUYV.name: Sympathy
mb9gEAkIZ0mVDLUYV.notes: Death of one party kills the other and wounds affect ally but not you

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else
from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else

mXh9CzY-xWubycaqY.name: Off-the-Shelf Looks
mXh9CzY-xWubycaqY.notes: Halves the usual reaction bonus - adjust manually

features.situation: from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.

from those attracted to members of your sex, +2 from everyone else. Exception: Members of the same sex with reason to dislike you (more than -4 in reaction penalties regardless of bonuses) resent your good looks and react at -2 instead.
from sapient being with whom you actively interact (converse, lecture, etc.)

moNow2rAJxPa3R8DD.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

mm3m-ivkziT440cwR.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

tiSNfOy4LD_i7gT0M.name: Cultural Familiarity (any)
tiSNfOy4LD_i7gT0M.notes: Do not suffer the normal -3 penalty for unfamiliarity

features.situation: from others in social situations when you have a chance to plan your attire in advance
to someone else's reaction bonus from others when you put together their outfit
to trained Acting skill for the sole purpose of "acting innocent"
from others who can hear your voice

mGUjIlxggAOa7v9gQ.name: @Who: Individual with 150% of PC's starting points@

mwbIGQoXIQJOP4cm0.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 1000 times starting wealth@

mhV1B0a4PAMA2FjDl.name: @Who: Individual with twice the PC's starting points@

mRxzxnqF3SBNQiHk4.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 10000 times starting wealth@

mCQDfdRBfP3e2i_q9.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 100000 times starting wealth@

mOcIndG3zhsVdN3jL.name: @Who: Organization with assets of at least 1000000 times starting wealth@

m5Z8-zn47CYF7jcX_.name: @Who: A national government or giant multi-national organization@

mtIJxB3FVsxn_Ju3W.name: Equipment
mtIJxB3FVsxn_Ju3W.notes: @Equipment worth no more than average starting wealth@

muR3z9SMlOwmVvpLK.name: Equipment
muR3z9SMlOwmVvpLK.notes: @Equipment worth more than average starting wealth@

mjrYUnMFw8SHI24xA.name: Special Abilities
mjrYUnMFw8SHI24xA.notes: @Magical powers in a non-magical world, higher TL equipment, grants special powers or is supernatural@

mxO1SwJF92LeqW30a.name: People Affected
mxO1SwJF92LeqW30a.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

mZhVDDtg_3NnyleAq.name: Narrow Clearance on a "Need to Know" Basis

mUOl0HY9eToFts6sD.name: Broad Clearance on a "Need to Know" Basis

tOqaDrOq5yWUeok0d.name: Social Chameleon
tOqaDrOq5yWUeok0d.notes: Exempt from reaction penalties due to differences in Rank or Status

features.situation: from those who demand respect in situations where there would be no penalties due to differences in Rank or Status
from con artists, politicians, salesmen, etc. – but only if you aren’t trying to manipulate them.

tagFk69SmkZFo5ssa.name: Acrophobia (Heights)
tagFk69SmkZFo5ssa.notes: You may not voluntarily go more than 15 feet above ground, unless you are inside a building and away from windows. If there is some chance of an actual fall, self-control rolls are at -5.

tLz0qyCzAJ9aiSodO.name: Agoraphobia (Open Spaces)
tLz0qyCzAJ9aiSodO.notes: You are uncomfortable whenever you are outside, and actually become frightened when there are no walls within 50 feet.

tvWpE4iVh3EGBN6Er.name: Aichmophobia/TL5- (Sharp Things)
tvWpE4iVh3EGBN6Er.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

t-HnJ8D26edJMRg3a.name: Charitable
t-HnJ8D26edJMRg3a.notes: Make a self-control roll in any situation where you could render aid or are specifically asked for help, but should resist the urge

tbgwP-IcQyWZNz6xP.name: Aichmophobia/TL6+ (Sharp Things)
tbgwP-IcQyWZNz6xP.notes: You are afraid of anything pointed. Swords, spears, knives, and needles all give you fits. Trying to use a sharp weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

tgXscj2dagYIxu7sD.name: Ailurophobia (Cats)
tgXscj2dagYIxu7sD.notes: This includes all felines: lions, tigers, panthers, etc.

tUseArVPCe47RW87F.name: Autophobia (Being Alone)
tUseArVPCe47RW87F.notes: You cannot stand to be alone, and do anything in your power to avoid it.

tf3LE957SyJZHwggp.name: Brontophobia (Loud Noises)
tf3LE957SyJZHwggp.notes: You avoid any situation where loud noises are likely. A sudden loud noise requires an immediate self-control roll. A thunderstorm is a traumatic experience for you!

tDMKukWJLvctw1ANR.name: Claustrophobia (Enclosed Spaces)
tDMKukWJLvctw1ANR.notes: You are uncomfortable any time you can’t see the sky – or at least a very high ceiling. In a small room or vehicle, you feel the walls closing in on you... You need air! This is a dangerous fear for someone who plans to go underground.

tvYZ8nVXHqzPupAmU.name: Coitophobia (Sex)
tvYZ8nVXHqzPupAmU.notes: You are terrified by the idea of sexual relations or the loss of your virginity.

tpWeLjNcuuwwQ0TMP.name: Combat Paralysis
tpWeLjNcuuwwQ0TMP.notes: In any situation in which personal harm seems imminent, make a HT roll. Do not roll until the instant you need to fight, run, pull the trigger, or whatever. Any roll over 13 is a failure, even if you have HT 14+. On a success, you can act normally. On a failure, you are mentally stunned.

t3Vd_jIvJ3v92aKfr.name: Cowardice
t3Vd_jIvJ3v92aKfr.notes: Make a self-control roll any time you are called on to risk physical danger. Roll at -5 if you must risk death.

tQ2AJP3RtxHOeOQxD.name: Cynophobia (Dogs)
tQ2AJP3RtxHOeOQxD.notes: This includes all canines: foxes, wolves, coyotes, wild dogs, etc.

tiw8fYAbiyIy9Cm0X.name: Demophobia (Crowds)
tiw8fYAbiyIy9Cm0X.notes: Any group of over a dozen people sets off this fear unless they are all well known to you. The self-control roll is at -1 for over 25 people, -2 for a crowd of 100 or more, -3 for 1,000, -4 for 10,000, and so on.

tHIQTsdmmCRmqakwq.name: Entomophobia (Insects)
tHIQTsdmmCRmqakwq.notes: You are afraid of all “bugs.” Large or poisonous ones give -3 to self-control rolls. Very large ones, or large numbers, give -6. Avoid hills of giant ants.

tXvPD6zEn9ns3gNAj.name: Gluttony
tXvPD6zEn9ns3gNAj.notes: Make a self-control roll when presented with a tempting morsel or good wine that, for some reason, you should resist. If you fail, you partake – regardless of the consequences.

tLYCh46i5dn5gB__d.name: Hemophobia (Blood)
tLYCh46i5dn5gB__d.notes: The sight of blood gives you the screaming willies! You need to make a self-control roll during most combats...

tb17az5mGA0YWN14h.name: Herpetophobia (Reptiles)
tb17az5mGA0YWN14h.notes: You come unglued at the thought of reptiles, amphibians, and similar scaly slimies. A very large reptile, or a poisonous one, gives -2 to self-control rolls; a horde of reptiles (such as a snake pit) gives -4.

tMxREUq2UO6QF-8bP.name: Hoplophobia (Weapons)
tMxREUq2UO6QF-8bP.notes: The presence of any sort of weaponry is stressful. Trying to use a weapon, or being threatened with one, requires a self-control roll at -2.

trWY8vgazoVelouAG.name: Low Pain Threshold
trWY8vgazoVelouAG.notes: Double the shock from any injury. Whenever you take a wound that does more than 1 HP of damage, you must make a Will roll to avoid crying out.

features.situation: to resist knockdown, stunning, and physical torture

t8vdO4RAeTdOqXZlX.name: Manaphobia (Magic)
t8vdO4RAeTdOqXZlX.notes: You can never learn to use magic, and you react badly to any user of magic. Make a self-control roll whenever you are in the presence of magic. This roll is at -3 if you are to be the target of friendly magic, and -6 if you are the target of hostile magic. (The magic does not have to be real, if you believe in it!)

tW4Zcu0o53oiFQANQ.name: Mysophobia (Dirt)
tW4Zcu0o53oiFQANQ.notes: You are deathly afraid of infection, or just of dirt and filth. Make a self-control roll when you must do something that might get you dirty. Roll at -5 to eat any unaccustomed food. You should act as “finicky” as possible.

tnMICe7YqsnO-trwM.name: Necrophobia (Death)
tnMICe7YqsnO-trwM.notes: You are terrified by the idea of death. Make a self-control roll in the presence of any dead body (animals don’t count, but portions of human bodies do). Roll at -4 if the body is that of someone you know, or -6 if the body is unnaturally animated in some way. A ghost (or apparent ghost) also requires a roll at -6.

tlstYCO1bj7EzQGEn.name: Overconfidence
tlstYCO1bj7EzQGEn.notes: You must make a self-control roll any time the GM feels you show an unreasonable degree of caution. If you fail, you must go ahead as though you were able to handle the situation!

features.situation: from young or naive individuals who believe you are as good as you say you are

tB_F4aeRUNItS3RFS.name: Pacifism: Cannot Harm Innocents
tB_F4aeRUNItS3RFS.notes: You may fight – you may even start fights – but you may only use deadly force on a foe that is attempting to do you serious harm. Capture is not “serious harm” unless you are already under penalty of death or have a Code of Honor that would require suicide if captured. You never intentionally do anything that causes, or even threatens to cause, injury to the uninvolved – particularly if they are “ordinary folks.”

t22LldNncg36iRKiC.name: Pacifism: Cannot Kill
t22LldNncg36iRKiC.notes: You may fight – you may even start fights – but you may never do anything that seems likely to kill another. This includes abandoning a wounded foe to die “on his own”! You must do your best to keep your companions from killing, too. If you do kill someone (or feel responsible for a death), you immediately suffer a nervous breakdown. Roll 3d and be totally morose and useless for that many days. During this time, you must make a Will roll to offer any sort of violence toward anyone, for any reason.

tniIYFJHRirEbtEHA.name: Pacifism: Reluctant Killer
tniIYFJHRirEbtEHA.notes: You are psychologically unprepared to kill people. Whenever you make a deadly attack (e.g., with a knife or a gun) against an obvious person whose face is visible to you, you are at -4 to hit and may not Aim. If you cannot see the foe’s face (due to a mask, darkness, or distance, or because you attacked from behind), the penalty is only -2, save in close combat. You have no penalty to attack a vehicle (even an occupied one), an opponent you do not believe is a person (including things with Horrific or Monstrous appearance), or a target you can’t actually see (e.g., a set of map coordinates or a blip on a radar screen). If you kill a recognizable person, the effect on you is the same as for Pacifism: Cannot Kill. You have no problem with your allies killing; you may even supply ammo, loaded weapons, and encouragement! You just can’t do the killing yourself.

tnQdP3-2XRgyaNJXP.name: Pacifism: Self-Defense Only
tnQdP3-2XRgyaNJXP.notes: You only fight to defend yourself or those in your care, using only as much force as necessary (no pre-emptive strikes allowed!). You must do your best to discourage others from starting fights.

tKf53Ly2W3ZkplO5w.name: Post-Combat Shakes
tKf53Ly2W3ZkplO5w.notes: Make a self-control roll at the end of any battle. If you fail, roll 3d, add the amount by which you failed your self-control roll, and look up the result on the Fright Check Table.

ti5-Vg5iBRLW0zPnj.name: Pyrophobia (Fire)
ti5-Vg5iBRLW0zPnj.notes: Even a burning cigarette bothers you if it comes within five yards.

m3fTq1jwseCQ4egOV.name: People Affected
m3fTq1jwseCQ4egOV.notes: Almost everyone except @large class of people@

t4CbD7Y5BFkcq6tVf.name: Scotophobia (Darkness)
t4CbD7Y5BFkcq6tVf.notes: A common fear, but crippling. You should avoid being underground if possible; if something happens to your flashlight or torch, you might well lose your mind before you can relight it.

tjeBi3yttwuPbpEwz.name: Selfish
tjeBi3yttwuPbpEwz.notes: Make a self-control roll whenever you experience a clear social slight or “snub.” On a failure, you lash out at the offending party just as if you had Bad Temper.

features.situation: from others when your Selfishness surfaces

t9PlYNotZ2Jk9D9B7.name: Selfless
t9PlYNotZ2Jk9D9B7.notes: You must make a self-control roll to put your needs – even survival – before those of someone else.

tnI7EgWHGqWM8hi74.name: Teratophobia (Monsters)
tnI7EgWHGqWM8hi74.notes: Any “unnatural” creature sets off this fear. You have -1 to -4 on the self-control roll if the monster seems very large or dangerous, or if there are a lot of them. Note that the definition of “monster” depends on experience. An American Indian would consider an elephant monstrous, while an African pygmy would not!

tjLY3ojtYL51Ceyfh.name: Thalassophobia (Oceans)
tjLY3ojtYL51Ceyfh.notes: You are afraid of any large body of water. Ocean travel, or even air travel over the ocean, is basically impossible for you, and encounters with aquatic monsters are also upsetting.

tL_PA3zuKHL9tFKvC.name: Triskaidekaphobia (Number 13)
tL_PA3zuKHL9tFKvC.notes: You must make a self-control roll whenever you have to deal with the number 13. Roll at -5 if Friday the 13th is involved!

tVp-KYx5Fd6_1k1_p.name: Unfit
tVp-KYx5Fd6_1k1_p.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate

features.situation: to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc

tq-cYtvDa9MKHR2KQ.name: Unluckiness
tq-cYtvDa9MKHR2KQ.notes: Once per play session, the GM will arbitrarily and maliciously make something go wrong for you.

t52IXMWv8d0uR65_Q.name: Very Unfit
t52IXMWv8d0uR65_Q.notes: You lose FP at twice the normal rate and recover FP at only half the normal rate

features.situation: -2 to all HT rolls to remain conscious, avoid death, resist disease or poison, etc.

tanNPAKfdqYGhI0o7.name: Xenophobia (Strange and Unknown Things)
tanNPAKfdqYGhI0o7.notes: You are upset by any sort of strange circumstances, and in particular by strange people. Make a self-control roll when surrounded by people of another race or nationality; roll at -3 if the people are not human. If you lose control, you might well attack strangers out of fear.

SGlNmyI_2ZKq8gydN.name: Two extra points in primary or secondary skills
